item.title: Modernizing Architecture: Migrating from Hadoop to Data Lakehouse

item.title: SQL Server Performance: Accelerating Inserts with TABLOCK
item.description: How to use TABLOCK to enable minimal logging and speed up bulk data loads in SQL Server.
